definition: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.
pinyin: mu3 dan5 sui1 hao3 , quan2 zhang4 lu:4 ye4 fu2

definition: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.

containing_words.word: 牡丹虽好，全仗绿叶扶持

definition: Although the peony is beautiful, it depends entirely on help from the green leaves (idiom). However brilliant you may be, you can't do anything without support from others.

sentences.english: Put some greenery along the mantle to soften the edge a little bit.
sentences.chinese: 沿着壁炉架摆放了一些绿叶以使边线看起来柔和一点。

sentences.english: The Sun Yat-Sen Mausoleum is like a huge green leaf that warms and comforts the heart of every people in Nanjing.
sentences.chinese: 中山陵象一片巨大的绿叶，温润着每个南京人的心灵。

sentences.english: As soon as you enter in Wuhan, the greenery catches your eye.
sentences.chinese: 当你来到武汉，映入眼帘的是青枝绿叶。

sentences.english: Without green leaves, what is the beauty of tree?
sentences.chinese: 若无绿叶，树木有何美丽？

sentences.english: Some people like to start their dinner with a salad of lettuce or other leafy greens.
sentences.chinese: 有人喜欢晚餐前吃盘莴苣沙拉或其它绿叶蔬菜沙拉。

sentences.english: Person finally will become greenery be the ephemeris normal regulation.
sentences.chinese: 人终究会成为绿叶就是天体的正常规律。

sentences.english: Green leafy vegetables, like broccoli and Chinese cabbage, are also calcium-rich.
sentences.chinese: 绿叶蔬菜，如花椰菜和大白菜，也都富含钙质。

sentences.english: Later it grew the big and tall leaves.
sentences.chinese: 后来铁树长出了长长的绿叶。

sentences.english: I bear light shade for the leaves when laid In their noonday dreams.
sentences.chinese: 我为绿叶披上淡淡的凉荫，当他们歇息在午睡的梦境。

sentences.english: Green tea has the characteristics of "green leaves in a clear soup with a strong astringent taste ".
sentences.chinese: 绿茶的“绿叶在一个清汤具有强烈涩味特色”。

sentences.english: And at your feet is a swath of ants bearing triangular bits of green leaf.
sentences.chinese: 在脚下，则有一长列蚂蚁背负着三角形的绿叶碎片。

sentences.english: Do you see the grren leaves of each tree in the fields?
sentences.chinese: 你看到地里每棵树上的绿叶了吗？

sentences.english: My heart of a sudden has put on green leaves of desire.
sentences.chinese: 我的心蓦地绽出希望的绿叶。
绿叶菜和低碳水化合物蔬菜。

sentences.english: The  Chinese flowering crabapple looks still even  more  charming against  the  green leaves.
sentences.chinese: 在绿叶的映衬下，海棠花显得更加娇艳。

sentences.english: Drinking Wheatgrass juice is a great way for you to increase your intake of leafy green vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 喝麦草果汁可以增加身体对绿叶蔬菜营养的吸收。

definition: style of folk song popular in Gansu, Qinghai and Ningxia/CL:首[shou3]
variant of 枝椏|枝桠[zhi1 ya1]
flourishing blossom/a mass of flowers/luxuriant flowers
